name: nanogallery
title: jQuery nanoGALLERY
description: Simplistic to use image gallery plugin for jQuery, with support for pulling in Flickr and Picasa/Google+ photo albums among others. 30 animated thumbnails hover effects (combinable). Mobile-friendly and responsive. Smooth in/out transitions. Breadcrumb for multi-level navigation. Images are shown as clickable thumbnails, which will expand to full view via a modal popup window. Support custom themes.
